channel.title: [PI] Some guys keeps joining my server
channel.description: and spawns all these items fucking up the eco, i know he is using a cheat client and i already did the UID part to prevent cheat clients, now he's still able to connect and spawn items.. Are there any other ways to prevent cheat clients then the UID's?

item.title: [PI] Some guys keeps joining my server
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“StonedC0D3r, post:4, topic:518807”]RSA ?

And have you ever heard of the magical IP changer? Or the magical VPN ?[/quote]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/305532-any-revision-enabling-rsa.html

Read full topic
